import React, { useContext } from 'react' import '../CartItems/CartItems.css' import { ShopContext } from '../../ShopContext/ShopContext'; import remove_icon from '../assets/cart_cross_icon.png' export const CartItems = () => { const {all_product,cartItems,removeFromCart} = useContext(ShopContext); return (

products

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_product.map((e)=>{ /* if quantity>0 then only exist */ if(cartItems[e.id]>0){ return(

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

${e.new_price*cartItems[e.id]}

{removeFromCart(e.id)}} className='cartitems-remove-icon' alt=""/>
) } return null; })}

Cart Total

Subtotal

${0}

Shipping Free

Free

Total

${0}

If You Have A Promo Code Enter It Here

) }
